synthesis_conditions.equipment: three way flask under nitrogen atmosphere
synthesis_conditions.procedure: Stirred at room temperature for 3 h, then KF and methanol added and stirred in air overnight. Solvents removed, residue purified by silica gel column chromatography and recrystallized using hot EtOH/water.
Hydrolyzed using KOH in EtOH and H2O, evaporated, dissolved in water, acidified with HCl until precipitation, filtered and dried.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with DMF (50 mL × 2) and MeOH (20 mL × 1)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: immersed in deoxidized MeOH (50 mL) overnight and then degassed under vacuum at 80 °C for 12 h
